jump_scares.spoiler: Arnie is decapitated by an unseen assailant
Two eyes can be seen peering out from underneath some floorboards
A spider drops down in front of a man during a tense scene
A pot breaks
The werewolf’s hand bursts through the floorboards and grabs a man
A man accidentally stands on a bear trap during a tense scene
The werewolf attacks a man from behind
The werewolf suddenly puts a hand on a man’s face
A man’s bloodied face suddenly appears out of the fog
Jane is startled by a mouse
Lowe suddenly appears in front of the sheriff. [Video]
Jane sees the werewolf at the window
The werewolf suddenly cuts the power to the house
The werewolf breaks down the wall behind Red
Lowe, who appears to be dead, suddenly spasms back into life. [Video]
A dog jumps up at a window that Terry is looking out of
There is a gunshot and some glass breaks (during a flashback)
An abrupt scene change accompanied by a loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A werewolf jumps out from behind Bill
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, Terry walks into a bone hanging from the roof
A werewolf hand breaks through some wood paneling to grab Terry
A werewolf hand reaches out to grab the files from Terry
As Karen backs away from the door, a man suddenly jumps out behind her from under a sheet
There is a loud bang on Karen’s car as she gets into it
The window that Chris is standing in front of suddenly breaks
There is a loud noise and some birds fly away
A man turns around and is suddenly attacked by a werewolf. [Video
There is a crack of a whip accompanied by a sudden scene change
A dog suddenly barks at Lawrence
Accompanied by a sound effect, Lawrence lifts the sheet to view his brothers decomposed corse
A man is tackled by a fast moving werewolf
A policeman’s outstretched hand is suddenly attacked by the werewolf
The werewolf jumps down onto Lawrence from atop a stone pillar
During a hallucination, the werewolf attacks Lawrence while he is in bed. [Video
Lawrence is startled as his father appears in front of him
A man shoots his gun and the muzzle flash reveals the werewolf standing right beside him
During a hallucination, Lawrence looks at the mirror while holding Gwen and sees the reflection of a werewolf
The werewolf suddenly appears from behind Lawrence and lets out a roar. [Video
A loud thump startles Gwen as she walks through her antique shop
Lawrence lights a match and looks up to see a dead man hanging in front of him
A dog barks at Lawrence
The werewolf roars as it appears in front of Gwen
The apparently dead werewolf suddenly grabs Gwen’s arm
